<https://github.com/vim/vim/commit/89015a675990bd7d70e041c5d890edb803b5c6b7|patch 8.2.2244: crash when making the window width negative>
patch 8.2.2244: crash when making the window width negative

Problem:    Crash when making the window width of the not-current window
            negative.
Solution:   Make sure the window width is not negative. (closes #7568)

attachments.fallback: GitHub: patch 8.2.2244: crash when making the window width negative · vim/vim@89015a6
attachments.title: patch 8.2.2244: crash when making the window width negative · vim/vim@89015a6
attachments.text: Problem: Crash when making the window width of the not-current window negative. Solution: Make sure the window width is not negative. (closes #7568)

patch 8.2.2243: crash when popup mask contains zeroes

patch 8.2.2241: Build with Ruby and clang may fail

text:
<https://github.com/vim/vim/commit/41a834d1e3dbf9c8759737bcd6524159a9b93d2a|patch 8.2.2240: clientserver test fails if full path is used>
patch 8.2.2240: clientserver test fails if full path is used

Problem:    Clientserver test fails if full path is used.
Solution:   Ignore the path preceding the file name.

attachments.fallback: GitHub: patch 8.2.2240: clientserver test fails if full path is used · vim/vim@41a834d
attachments.title: patch 8.2.2240: clientserver test fails if full path is used · vim/vim@41a834d
attachments.text: Problem: Clientserver test fails if full path is used. Solution: Ignore the path preceding the file name.

text:
<https://github.com/vim/vim/commit/dcc58e031ded8b846a39146112b9b075cbb977d9|patch 8.2.2239: Vim9: concatenating lines with backslash is inconvenient>
patch 8.2.2239: Vim9: concatenating lines with backslash is inconvenient

Problem:    Vim9: concatenating lines with backslash is inconvenient.
Solution:   Support concatenating lines starting with '|', useful for
            :autocmd, :command, etc. (closes #6702)

attachments.fallback: GitHub: patch 8.2.2239: Vim9: concatenating lines with backslash is inconvenient · vim/vim@dcc58e0
attachments.title: patch 8.2.2239: Vim9: concatenating lines with backslash is inconvenient · vim/vim@dcc58e0
attachments.text: Problem: Vim9: concatenating lines with backslash is inconvenient. Solution: Support concatenating lines starting with '|', useful for :autocmd, :command, etc. (closes #6702)

text:
<https://github.com/vim/vim/commit/9b8d62267f583d5dc042920adb1de046959ad11d|patch 8.2.2238: Vim9: cannot load a Vim9 script without the +eval fea…>
patch 8.2.2238: Vim9: cannot load a Vim9 script without the +eval feature

Problem:    Vim9: cannot load a Vim9 script without the +eval feature.
Solution:   Support Vim9 script syntax without the +eval feature.

attachments.title: patch 8.2.2238: Vim9: cannot load a Vim9 script without the +eval fea… · vim/vim@9b8d622
attachments.text: …ture Problem: Vim9: cannot load a Vim9 script without the +eval feature. Solution: Support Vim9 script syntax without the +eval feature.
